description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军少将。曾任中共浙江省委第一书记、浙江省人民政府省长、浙江省政协主席、浙江省人大常委会主任等职。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a major general in the People's Liberation Army. He served as the First Secretary of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee, Governor of Zhejiang Province, Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial CPPCC, and Director of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾接替铁瑛担任浙江省省长、浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Tie Ying as Governor of Zhejiang and Director of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在浙江省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，铁瑛的前任浙江省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tie Ying's predecessor as Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，铁瑛的继任浙江省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tie Ying's successor as Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，铁瑛的前任中共浙江省委书记和浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tie Ying's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee and Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，铁瑛的继任中共浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Tie Ying's successor as Secretary of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省东北部的一个县，隶属于濮阳市。
description.en: A county in the northeast of Henan Province, China, under the administration of Puyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省的省会。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校。
description.en: A school established by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War to train military and political cadres.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共合作期间，由中国工农红军主力改编的、隶属于国民革命军的部队，实际由中国共产党领导。
description.en: During the Second United Front, the main force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army was reorganized into this unit, nominally part of the National Revolutionary Army but actually led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国山东省设立的军区。
description.en: A military region formerly established by the People's Liberation Army in Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在解放战争后期至中华人民共和国成立初期设立的大军区之一。
description.en: One of the major military regions established by the People's Liberation Army from the later stage of the Chinese Civil War to the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国上海市的公安部队。
description.en: Formerly the public security force of Shanghai, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在浙江省设立的军队一级组织，属省级军区。
description.en: A first-level military organization established by the People's Liberation Army in Zhejiang Province, categorized as a provincial military district.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。
description.en: The full-scale war fought from the 1930s to the 1940s, in which China resisted the invasion by the Empire of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 指1945年至1950年间，由中国国民党与中国共产党领导的两个政权在中国境内爆发的内战。
description.en: Refers to the civil war in China from 1945 to 1950 between the two regimes led by the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的，作为中国共产党元老们的过渡性组织。
description.en: A transitional body for elderly leaders of the Communist Party of China that existed from 1982 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1916年11月19日出生于当时的河北省南乐县。
description.en: Tie Ying was born in Nanle County, then part of Hebei Province, on November 19, 1916.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1937年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tie Ying joined the Communist Party of China in December 1937.

relationships.target: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1979年12月至1983年4月担任浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Tie Ying served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress from December 1979 to April 1983.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1977年12月至1979年12月担任中国人民政治协商会议浙江省委员会主席。
description.en: Tie Ying served as the Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference from December 1977 to December 1979.

relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1977年2月至1983年3月担任中共浙江省委书记（后为第一书记）。
description.en: Tie Ying served as the Secretary (later First Secretary) of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee from February 1977 to March 1983.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1977年2月至1979年12月担任浙江省省长（时称浙江省革命委员会主任）。
description.en: Tie Ying served as the Governor of Zhejiang Province (then titled Director of the Zhejiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee) from February 1977 to December 1979.

description.zh-cn: 自1972年起，铁瑛担任浙江省军区第一政委。
description.en: Since 1972, Tie Ying served as the First Political Commissar of the Zhejiang Military District.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛曾任抗日军政大学一分校一大队组织干事。
description.en: Tie Ying served as an Organization Officer in the First Brigade of the First Branch of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

position.zh-cn: 组织股长兼党分总支书记
position.en: Organization Section Chief and concurrent Party Branch Secretary

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛曾任八路军山东纵队一支队二团组织股长兼党分总支书记。
description.en: Tie Ying served as the Organization Section Chief and concurrent Party Branch Secretary of the Second Regiment, First Detachment, Shandong Column of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛在中共十三大上当选为中顾委委员。
description.en: Tie Ying was elected as a member of the Central Advisory Commission at the 13th National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛于1937年10月参加革命工作，参与了中国抗日战争。
description.en: Tie Ying joined the revolutionary work in October 1937 and participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 铁瑛参与了第二次国共内战。
description.en: Tie Ying participated in the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 谭启龙是铁瑛的前任中共浙江省委书记和浙江省省长。
description.en: Tan Qilong was Tie Ying's predecessor as both Secretary of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee and Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 李丰平是铁瑛的继任浙江省省长和浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Li Fengping was Tie Ying's successor as both Governor of Zhejiang and Director of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 江华是铁瑛的前任浙江省政协主席。
description.en: Jiang Hua was Tie Ying's predecessor as Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 毛齐华是铁瑛的继任浙江省政协主席。
description.en: Mao Qihua was Tie Ying's successor as Chairman of the Zhejiang Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 王芳是铁瑛的继任中共浙江省委书记。
description.en: Wang Fang was Tie Ying's successor as Secretary of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee.
